Rumination
14 Mar 1999
Words by Hillel the Elder (Pirkei Avot 1:14)
If I am not for myself,
Who will be for me?

If I am only for myself,
What am I?

If not now,
When?
C/Am/Em/F

F/G/F/G/F/G/A

F/E/F/G
